Community.origin: [a spouse may not…lease to a third person his undivided interest in the or in particular things of the " Louisiana Civil Code "]

1.definition: the people who live in a particular place or region and usually are linked by some common interests

2 a.definition: the mass of community property owned by a husband and wife [a spouse may not…lease to a third person his undivided interest in the or in particular things of the ""]

sub_terms.b: the entity created upon the marriage of a husband and wife for the purposes of ownership of property in community property states [an agreement terminating the ] see alsoat,
